Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that it was "perfectly legal" for Rittenhouse to possess the rifle without parental supervision.
Understate: The claim understates the legal complexity of Rittenhouse's possession of the rifle.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that it was "perfectly legal" for Rittenhouse to possess the rifle.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Rittenhouse's possession of the rifle was legal based on his age alone, without considering other relevant factors.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or interpretations of the law regarding Rittenhouse's possession of the rifle.
